sentence.Network_en: Pinch out the tips of the young growths to make for compact, bushy plants.
sentence.Network_cn: 掐掉幼株的芽尖以便让它们长得紧凑浓密，呈丛生状。

sentence.Network_en: The stranger's face was hidden by dark --- Blue spectacles and Bushy sidewhiskers.
sentence.Network_cn: 陌生人戴着深蓝色的眼镜,加上浓密的络腮胡子,整个脸都被遮盖了.

entry.def: Bushy hair or fur is very thick.
A bushy plant has a lot of leaves very close together.

means.word_mean: 1. used of hair; thick and poorly groomed;
2. resembling a bush in being thickly branched and spreading

auth_sentence.content: They have also become more common in bushy gardens in towns in recent years.
